data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字

data.partBlankContent: Priscilla ran to the front door excitedly. It w__ her birt____, a__ she kn__ that a gift wo___ be arri____ from h__ grandparents. She w__ waiting f__ it a__ week. When she finally received it, she was so excited that she got the box open in seconds!
data.fullContent: Priscilla ran to the front door excitedly. It was her birthday, and she knew that a gift would be arriving from her grandparents. She was waiting for it all week. When she finally received it, she was so excited that she got the box open in seconds!
data.answer: 普丽西拉兴奋地跑到前门。今天是她的生日，她知道祖父母会送她一份礼物。她等了整整一周。当她最终收到的时候，她非常兴奋，几秒钟就把盒子打开了!
